title: Playgirl font
content:
Hi.

Can you identify this font?

Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [playgirl font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018224824/http:/typophile.com/files/playgirl%20font.jpg) | 43.58 KB |
author: Shawali

comments.content: Proprietary font, "Playgirl", designed by Antonio "Tony" DeSpigna. [Short write-up here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018224824/http:/luc.devroye.org/usa-newyork.html). - Herb
You can fairly approximate it using [Thorowgood Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018224824/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/thorowgood).
